project(glfw)

if (MSVC)
find_library(GLFW3_LIBRARY NAMES glfw3 PATHS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} NO_SYSTEM_ENVIROMENT_PATH)
else()
find_library(GLFW3_LIBRARY NAMES libglfw3 PATHS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} NO_SYSTEM_ENVIROMENT_PATH)
endif()

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE)
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES 
    INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES ${GLFW3_LIBRARY}
    INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
